feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:02 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 8.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 2:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 7.7°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 15.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 70 to 90 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:59 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending before morning then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 1:59 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:59 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 1:59 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
